name: Expect No Mercy (itch)
description:
Sinful Human 

You broke the biggest taboo God placed upon you 

Driven by madness you created artificial self and imbued it with artifical soul 

Again you could live with beloved ones that was just deceitful shell 

You broke taboo 

Even if you beg The Almighity One, He will throw you out of the paradise that was destroyed by you and your offspring 

Crawl and fight till very end

Credits:

Patryk Utkała - Lead designer, programming

Wojciech Rosenthal - enemy design, programming, 

Adam Leczkowski - programming, environment artist

Paweł Fum Tumialis - spaceship model
